languages.text: {n}Замерший Маражай поворачивает голову к сородичу — и вы замечаете на его шее под ухом тонкую красную полосу, похожую на свежий шов. Дрожа всем телом от едва сдерживаемой ярости, бывший дракон впивается в вас взглядом темных глаз.{/n}

{n}The motionless Marazhai turns his head toward his kin, and you notice a thin red stripe on his neck below his ear, like a fresh stitch. Shaking with barely contained rage, the former Dracon stares at you with dark eyes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Замерший Маражай поворачивает голову к сородичу — и вы замечаете на его шее под ухом тонкую красную полосу, похожую на свежий шов. Дрожа всем телом от едва сдерживаемой ярости, бывший дракон впивается в вас взглядом темных глаз.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The motionless Marazhai turns his head toward his kin, and you notice a thin red stripe on his neck below his ear, like a fresh stitch. Shaking with barely contained rage, the former Dracon stares at you with dark eyes.{/n}

{n}The motionless Marazhai turns his head toward his kin, and you notice a thin red stripe on his neck below his ear, like a fresh stitch. Shaking with barely contained rage, the former Dracon stares at you with dark eyes.{/n}

{n}The motionless Marazhai turns his head toward his kin, and you notice a thin red stripe on his neck below his ear, like a fresh stitch. Shaking with barely contained rage, the former Dracon stares at you with dark eyes.{/n}

{n}The motionless Marazhai turns his head toward his kin, and you notice a thin red stripe on his neck below his ear, like a fresh stitch. Shaking with barely contained rage, the former Dracon stares at you with dark eyes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋一动不动，盯着他的同伴。你注意到，他耳朵下方的皮肤布满了细密的红色条纹，看起来像是刚刚被针缝过。你眼前的前任裁决官用黑色的眼睛盯着你，浑身颤抖，几乎无法克制他的怒火。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The motionless Marazhai turns his head toward his kin, and you notice a thin red stripe on his neck below his ear, like a fresh stitch. Shaking with barely contained rage, the former Dracon stares at you with dark eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋一动不动，盯着他的同伴。你注意到，他耳朵下方的皮肤布满了细密的红色条纹，看起来像是刚刚被针缝过。你眼前的前任裁决官用黑色的眼睛盯着你，浑身颤抖，几乎无法克制他的怒火。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Au moment où Marazhai tourne la tête vers son congénère, vous remarquez une fine cicatrice dans son cou, juste sous son oreille, comme s'il avait récemment été recousu. Tremblant d'une rage incontrôlable, l'ancien Dracon vous foudroie du regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The motionless Marazhai turns his head toward his kin, and you notice a thin red stripe on his neck below his ear, like a fresh stitch. Shaking with barely contained rage, the former Dracon stares at you with dark eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Au moment où Marazhai tourne la tête vers son congénère, vous remarquez une fine cicatrice dans son cou, juste sous son oreille, comme s'il avait récemment été recousu. Tremblant d'une rage incontrôlable, l'ancien Dracon vous foudroie du regard.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, inmóvil, gira la cabeza hacia su congénere y ves una delgada línea roja en su cuello por debajo de la oreja, similar a una sutura. Temblando con furia apenas contenida, el Dracón caído te fulmina con una mirada siniestra.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The motionless Marazhai turns his head toward his kin, and you notice a thin red stripe on his neck below his ear, like a fresh stitch. Shaking with barely contained rage, the former Dracon stares at you with dark eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, inmóvil, gira la cabeza hacia su congénere y ves una delgada línea roja en su cuello por debajo de la oreja, similar a una sutura. Temblando con furia apenas contenida, el Dracón caído te fulmina con una mirada siniestra.{/n}

languages.text: {n}動きを止めたマラズハイがキンの方へと顔を向けると、彼の耳の下の首筋に縫い目のような赤い細い筋があることに気がついた。かろうじて怒りを抑え込みつつ、かつてのドラコンは暗い瞳であなたを見つめる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The motionless Marazhai turns his head toward his kin, and you notice a thin red stripe on his neck below his ear, like a fresh stitch. Shaking with barely contained rage, the former Dracon stares at you with dark eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}動きを止めたマラズハイがキンの方へと顔を向けると、彼の耳の下の首筋に縫い目のような赤い細い筋があることに気がついた。かろうじて怒りを抑え込みつつ、かつてのドラコンは暗い瞳であなたを見つめる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der reglose Marazhai dreht seinen Kopf zu seinem Verwandten, und du bemerkst an seinem Hals unter seinem Ohr einen dünnen, roten Streifen, wie eine frische Naht. Der ehemalige Dracon zittert vor kaum zurückgehaltener Wut und starrt dich mit finsteren Augen an.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The motionless Marazhai turns his head toward his kin, and you notice a thin red stripe on his neck below his ear, like a fresh stitch. Shaking with barely contained rage, the former Dracon stares at you with dark eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der reglose Marazhai dreht seinen Kopf zu seinem Verwandten, und du bemerkst an seinem Hals unter seinem Ohr einen dünnen, roten Streifen, wie eine frische Naht. Der ehemalige Dracon zittert vor kaum zurückgehaltener Wut und starrt dich mit finsteren Augen an.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hareketsiz kalan Marazhai'ın başını soydaşına doğru çevirmesiyle boynunda, kulağının hemen altında yeni dikiş atılmış gibi ince, kırmızı bir çizgi görüyorsun. İçindeki hiddeti bastırmakta zorlanan eski Drakon, kararmış gözleriyle sana ters ters bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The motionless Marazhai turns his head toward his kin, and you notice a thin red stripe on his neck below his ear, like a fresh stitch. Shaking with barely contained rage, the former Dracon stares at you with dark eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hareketsiz kalan Marazhai başını soydaşına doğru çevirince boynunda, kulağının hemen altında yeni dikiş atılmışçasına ince, kırmızı bir çizgi görüyorsun. İçindeki hiddeti bastırmakta zorlanan eski Drakon, kararmış gözleriyle ters ters sana bakıyor.{/n}
